resources.string:
RTC co-anchoring + ultra-low-latency playback: 
1. Anchor A
1.1 Anchor A starts publishing streams.
1.2 Anchor A’s audience play anchor A’s streams.

2. Anchor B
2.1 Anchor B starts publishing streams.
2.2 Anchor B’s audience play anchor B’s streams.

3. Co-anchoring
3.1 Anchor A plays anchor B’s streams.
3.2 Anchor B plays anchor A’s streams.

4. Audience
4.1 Anchor A’s audience play anchor B’s streams.
4.2 Anchor B’s audience play anchor A’s streams.
